history.title: Our historical hotel
history.bio: Our hotel was built in 1625 and has a rich history of 400 years. It offers a combination of modern amenities and a historic setting. Each room has its own historical features, providing guests with an unforgettable experience.

historyPage.title: Our historical
historyPage.bio: Throughout its 400-year history, our hotel has undergone many changes, but has always sought to provide the best service to its guests.
historyPage.bio2: The transformation of the historic madrasa into a hotel
historyPage.p: This year, the hotel was built by the founder of the building. It was originally used as a religious educational institution.
historyPage.p1: XIX asrda bino to'liq qayta ta'mirlandi va Yevropa arxitektura uslubida bezatildi. Bu davrda zamonaviy qulayliklar qo'shildi.
historyPage.p2: In the mid-20th century, electrical, water, and sewer systems were installed in the building. This ensured that the hotel met modern standards.
historyPage.bio8: After a complete restoration, it was converted into a hotel
historyPage.p3: As a result of the most recent restoration, the building was reopened as a modern hotel. Historical features have been preserved.
historyPage.desc: Today our hotel offers a perfect combination of modern amenities and historical atmosphere. In order for each guest to feel special, we always try to improve the quality of Service.

contact.title: Contact us
contact.bio: We are always ready to answer your questions and help you with your reservation.

house.title: Our rooms
house.bio: Each room combines a historic atmosphere and modern amenities

footer.bio: This hotel has a 400-year history and warmly welcomes every guest.
